thread.title: Court blocks US sales of old Samsung phones in Apple battle - The Item Extra
thread.title_full: Court blocks US sales of old Samsung phones in Apple battle - The Item Extra - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Item Extra
title: Court blocks US sales of old Samsung phones in Apple battle - The Item Extra
text:
" A federal appeals court is blocking Samsung Electronics from selling some of its older smartphones in the U.S. in the latest twist to a long-running legal battle over how much of the devices' technology was copied from Apple's iPhone. The ruling issued Thursday by the U.S. Federal Circuit Court of Appeals in Washington vindicates Apple, but might not hurt Samsung too much.
 The Item Extra.
